exemplum.p: The name element can be used for both personal names and place names:
exemplum.eg: <![CDATA[ <q>My dear <name type="person">Mr. Bennet</name>,</q> said his lady to him one day, <q>have you heard that <name type="place">Netherfield Park</name> is let at last?</q>]]>
exemplum.p: As shown above, the type attribute may be used to distinguish the one from the other.
Note that an explicit end-tag must be supplied for the paragraph immediately preceding the eg element within an exemplum, to prevent the eg from being mistaken for part of the paragraph.
名稱元素可以同時用於人名以及地名：
exemplum.eg: <![CDATA[ <q>我親愛的 <name type="person">班耐特</name>先生，</q> 有一天太太對他說， <q>你聽到<name type="place">尼得斐莊園</name> 終於租出去了嗎？</q>]]>
exemplum.p: 如上所示，屬性值 可用來分辨人名或地名。
